title: उत्तर प्रदेश में शारीरिक रूप से विक्षिप्त व्यक्ति को बच्चा चोरी के शक में भीड़ ने पीट-पीटकर मार डाला
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Jignesh is a writer and researcher at Alt News. He has a knack for visual investigation with a major interest in fact-checking videos and images. He has completed his Masters in Journalism from Gujarat University.
